DOC.brief_summary: To further characterize the transfer potential of marketed testosterone gel and new 1.62% formulation.
DOC.brief_title: Study of Serum Testosterone Levels in Non-dosed Females After Secondary Exposure
DOC.criteria: Healthy male and female volunteers, with a BMI 2035 kg/m2 (males) and 2030 kg/m2 (females). Males: history, current or suspected prostate or breast cancer. Female: pregnant or lactating.
